feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing many frontend components, hooks, and libraries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables with light/dark color definitions and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up providers and defines the main router with all app routes.
frontend/src/assets/generated.ts: Exports paths for generated image assets used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Ach: Displays an achievement with icon, difficulty color, and hover effects, indicating locked or unlocked state.
Popup animation for unlocked achievements with sound effects, trophy display, and auto‑dismiss timer.
Manages a queue of achievement popups and exposes a context method to trigger them.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Tro: Maps string icon identifiers to Lucide or custom-rendered trophy visuals based on size and class props.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper adding background, focus mode dimming, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestorePan: UI for exporting and importing JSON backups including coins and inventory data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with icons, active highlighting, sounds, and haptics.
frontend/src/components/chests/CardRevea: Displays a timed flip animation revealing a card value with tier-based styling and optional completion callback.
frontend/src/components/chests/ChestOpen: Handles the chest opening flow including confirmation, animations, card reveals, bonuses, and coin refresh.
frontend/src/components/chests/ChestShop: Shows chest options, bonus toggles, and open history, and manages opening dialogs and modifier state.
frontend/src/components/chests/ChestTile: Renders a clickable chest tile showing cost and card count, disabled if the user can't afford it.
frontend/src/components/coins/CoinBalanc: A floating coin counter badge that animates and plays effects when the balance increases.
Sheet showing detailed daily stats including sessions, reps, and tags.
frontend/src/components/DisciplineScoreC: Displays a discipline score with percentage and explanation using a rolling counter.
frontend/src/components/EnergyOrb.tsx: Renders an animated orb on a canvas showing progress, trend effects, and a percentage label.
frontend/src/components/FatigueRing.tsx: Draws a circular fatigue indicator with gradient progress and a numeric score.
frontend/src/components/FrostedBackgroun: Creates a fullscreen animated gradient background with a frosted blur effect.
frontend/src/components/GlowingRingMeter: Shows an animated glowing ring meter for a numeric value with a label.
Draws a 365‑day reps history line graph with animated reveal and click-to-select days.
frontend/src/components/HistoryGraphLife: Renders a lifetime strength curve graph with animated drawing based on session data.
frontend/src/components/InsightsPanel.ts: Lists generated performance insights with confidence bars.
frontend/src/components/MetricCard.tsx: Simple card displaying a metric value with optional icon and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/MicroProgressCel: Temporary popup celebrating small progress with sound and auto-dismiss.
frontend/src/components/MilestoneCelebra: Full-screen animated overlay celebrating a milestone with icon, text, and sound.
frontend/src/components/PredictedMaxPane: Shows strength predictions for multiple horizons with confidence and trend.
frontend/src/components/RankBadge.tsx: Renders an animated hexagonal rank badge with glow, gradients, and tap effects using SVG and sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/RankPromotionOve: Displays a full-screen rank-up overlay with sound, haptics, and a large animated RankBadge before auto-dismiss.
frontend/src/components/ReadinessMeter.t: Draws an animated circular readiness meter on canvas with color-coded progress and score text.
frontend/src/components/RecordCelebratio: Shows a brief full-screen celebration overlay for new records with sound, haptics, and animated text.
Provides a confirmation dialog to reset all user data, handling async reset logic and UI states.
frontend/src/components/RollingCounter.t: Animates number transitions using an ease-out curve for smooth counting effects.
frontend/src/components/SessionBuilder.t: Builds a custom workout session with pickers for sets, reps, weight, and duration, managing focus mode and SFX.
frontend/src/components/SessionQualityOv: Shows a temporary overlay displaying session quality with sound, an animated score, and contextual message.
frontend/src/components/StickmanPullupRi: Renders an animated SVG stickman performing pull-ups with breathing, motion, and glow effects driven by progress and volume.
frontend/src/components/StickmanVolumeCo: A volume control component with pull-up animation, haptics, tick sounds, and color‑changing display tied to a vertical slider.
frontend/src/components/StreakFlame.tsx: Canvas‑rendered animated flame that scales intensity and displays the current streak value.
frontend/src/components/SweatParticles.t: Canvas particle system that spawns and animates sweat droplets when active.
frontend/src/components/TagMultiSelect.t: Renders a set of predefined tags as selectable badges with toggle behavior.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeSl: A draggable vertical slider that updates volume, detects step changes, and handles drag interactions globally.
frontend/src/components/WheelPicker.tsx: A scroll‑wheel number picker with inertia, snapping, resistance at bounds, and tick sound feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAchievements.tsx: Provides context for unlocked achievement IDs and a method to refresh them from the service.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusMode.tsx: Tracks and exposes focus mode state through a simple context with enter and exit functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, creating AuthClient, loading stored identities, and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePullupStore.tsx: Manages offline pull-up sessions, user settings, and coins via IndexedDB, exposing CRUD functions through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating all data access is handled by usePullupStore.
frontend/src/hooks/useRankProgress.ts: Computes rank, next rank, and progress from session totals and exposes promotion checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Locks and restores page scroll state based on a boolean flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.tsx: Provides sound effects context managing volume, play/stop actions, and persistence in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables, and complex animations for ranks and UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/definition: Defines all achievement metadata and unlock conditions for reps, streaks, sets, and other metrics.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/detector.t: Detects newly unlocked achievements based on context and previously unlocked records.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/service.ts: Checks for new achievements, saves unlocks to storage, and provides lookup utilities.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/types.ts: Type definitions for achievements, unlock records, and evaluation context.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Calculates fatigue and consistency scores from recent session statistics and exposes formula text.
frontend/src/lib/animations.ts: Exports reusable animation configuration objects for UI transitions.
frontend/src/lib/backup.ts: Handles exporting and importing full offline database backups as JSON files.
frontend/src/lib/economy/chestOpenFlow.t: Handles chest opening: deducts coins, draws cards using modifiers, updates state, saves history, and refunds on failure.
frontend/src/lib/economy/chestsTypes.ts: Defines chest tiers, structures for chest data, wallet items, modifiers, and static chest definitions.
frontend/src/lib/economy/coinRewards.ts: Calculates coin rewards based on session reps, quality, milestones, achievements, streaks, and PRs.
frontend/src/lib/economy/drawCards.ts: Draws chest cards by applying modifiers to probability tables and performing weighted draws.
frontend/src/lib/economy/drawTables.ts: Provides base probability tables for each chest tier and a weighted random draw helper.
Applies calculated coin rewards, updates coin balance, and tracks the last award event.
frontend/src/lib/economy/economyStore.ts: Manages offline coin balance, chest history, wallet items, and modifier persistence.
frontend/src/lib/economy/modifiers.ts: Implements streak and daily bonus logic and adjusts draw probabilities accordingly.
frontend/src/lib/haptics.ts: Defines vibration patterns and exposes a helper to trigger haptic feedback.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/adaptiveSt: Generates multi‑horizon strength predictions based on recent session trends and data quality.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/advancedSt: Computes advanced training statistics including totals, productive weeks, improvement periods, and velocity.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/discipline: Calculates a discipline score from streaks, recent activity, and consistency, with an explanatory label.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/fatigueLoa: Estimates muscular and nervous system fatigue from recent sessions with decay over time.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/insights.t: Generates performance insights from pull-up sessions, analyzing time-of-day, rest duration, and training frequency patterns.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/lifetimeSt: Builds a lifetime strength curve by computing daily max reps and a rolling max from session history.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/longTermTr: Calculates long-term performance direction and strength by comparing recent training averages.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/microProgr: Detects small improvements or personal records by comparing a new session to recent averages and historical bests.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/milestones: Identifies new milestones based on lifetime totals, streaks, and major single-session improvements.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/pressure.t: Computes training pressure based on days since last session, flagging warnings and intensity levels.
Generates a readiness score using fatigue, streaks, recent intensity, and recovery time to recommend training load.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/sessionQua: Scores a session's quality using consistency, improvement relative to PRs, and fatigue indicators.
frontend/src/lib/offlineDb.ts: Implements an IndexedDB-backed offline database for sessions, settings, milestones, achievements, coins, and chest data.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedTags.ts: Exports a static list of preset tags for annotating pull-up sessions.
frontend/src/lib/ranks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total reps and provides helpers for rank lookup and progress calculation.
frontend/src/lib/reset.ts: Clears all offline data and reloads the app.
frontend/src/lib/sfx.ts: Defines sound effect types and a manager that loads audio files, plays/stops them, and controls volume and looping.
frontend/src/lib/stats.ts: Provides helper functions to compute daily totals, streaks, averages, and personal pull‑up records from session data.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for pull‑up sets, sessions, stats, user settings, ranks, streaks, and personal records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint that initializes React, React Query, identity provider, and renders the root App component.
Displays achievements with filtering, unlock status, scrolling list, and a selectable detail panel.
frontend/src/screens/AdvancedStatsScreen: Shows advanced workout statistics including lifetime totals, averages, strength metrics, and productivity insights.
frontend/src/screens/AnalyticsScreen.tsx: Renders analytics such as rank progress, streaks, averages, fatigue, readiness, predictions, and other performance metrics.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard presenting today’s totals, rank badge, streak, fatigue, readiness, and goal progress.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Displays daily, weekly, monthly, and lifetime workout stats with graphs, personal records, and a day-details sheet.
frontend/src/screens/LogScreen.tsx: Handles session logging, tagging, saving, analytics, achievements, milestones, and celebration overlays.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides controls for volume, daily goals, chest shop, backups, and data reset within a styled settings UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI styling.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s offline-first design, features, architecture, known issues, and required image assets.
